form.label: 006-R2.2 - Visitor Access Logs
form.description: Require manual or automated logging of visitor entry into and exit from the Physical Security Perimeter that includes date and time of the initial entry and last exit, the visitorâ€™s name, and the name of an individual point of contact responsible for the visitor, except during CIP Exceptional Circumstances.

search.query: | inputlookup cip_pra_completion_records | eval certification_date=strptime(completion_date, "%m/%d/%Y") | eval years_since_completion=(now() - certification_date)/60/60/24/365 | eval is_overdue=if(years_since_completion >= 7, "Out of Compliance", if(years_since_completion >= 6, "Needs PRA", "Completed")) | eval urgency=CASE( is_overdue="Out of Compliance", 0, is_overdue="Needs PRA", 1, 1=1, 10) | sort urgency

| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | `get_esp_zone(zone)` | `get_cip_asset_type(classification, cip_asset_type)` | search `get_high_medium_cip_assets(classification)` cip_asset_type="EACMS" OR cip_asset_type="PCA" | dedup zone sortby zone | fields zone

`get_visitoraccess_records` $espZone_tok$ | `get_physical_site_classification(site,location,asset_classification)` | search `get_high_medium_cip_assets(asset_classification)` | transaction badge_code,location,site startswith=eval(match(access_type, ".*ingress.*")) endswith=eval(match(access_type, ".*egress.*")) | eval badge_in=_time, badge_out=_time+duration | convert ctime(badge_in) ctime(badge_out) ctime(day) | eval badge_out=if(duration=0, "on-site", badge_out), duration=duration/60/60 | search identity=* | table site,badge_code,identity,location,badge_in,badge_out,duration | sort -badge_out | rename site as "ESP Zone", badge_code as "Badge ID", identity as "Badge Assigned To", location as Location, badge_in as "Badge In", badge_out as "Badge Out"
